name: Lil Big Invasion (itch)
description:
This action-adventure delivers classic dungeon puzzle solving in an all new way.

Those silly green guys got lost in tricky dungeons! Find them, keep them together and lure them with your light to the exit - a giant vacuum cleaner - in order to suck them back out.

Outsmart winds, spider webs and glowing flowers. Find secret pahts and meet helpful creatures. Activate switches and win epic boss fights with the power of your light. But be aware that flying consumes light energy. So keep your light recharged, rescue those silly guys and become a firefly hero!

Features:

• Win 5 unique boss fights
• Solve 40 handcrafted dungeons
• Rescue over 400 crazy little fireflies
• Throughout 5 different and exotic worlds
• Unique dungeon puzzle and adventure game
• Designed for Mouse input and Touch devices
• Easy to learn but hard to master (100% challenge + bonus content)


Distribution:

I'm currently working on the full PC Version and there's already an early free Demo for you to check out :)
